basics.name: Yotam Katznelson
basics.label: Professional IT Engineer and Technical Leader
basics.summary: Electric Engineer by education. Software Engineer by profession. Successfully leading development teams in various initiatives and domains. Excelling in distilling ideas into actions, bootstrapping tech teams and scaling operations. Strong knowledge base and familiarity with financial engineering, in the intersection between regulated/traditional finance and Blockchain technology.

work.name: Backed Finance AG
work.summary: Leading the operational efforts of the company. Coordinating HR, Legal, Compliance, Finance, and Business Development.

work.name: Backed Finance AG
work.summary: In charge of technical vision and engineering efforts of skilled engineers team. Revolutionizing financial structures and tokenizing real world assets on chain.

work.name: 21Shares AG
work.summary: Leading an international team of engineers and driving forward the technology vision of the organization. Scaled up the engineering department from 1 to 50 engineers, across eight different teams. Architected, implemented and maintained a financial backoffice system that runs 24/7. Directing the technological & strategic thinking of the organization.

work.name: Securitize
work.location: Remote team - Germany / Ukraine / Israel / USA
work.summary: In charge of building white label platform for ICO of Security tokens on the Ethereum blockchain. System architecture. Coordination and orchestration of the product development.

work.name: Minerva
work.summary: Founder and technical lead of autonomous cryptocurrencies trading platform. Fullstack development of the entire platform. Business development and investors community management.

work.name: Neon GmbH (rebranded to Trade Republic)
work.summary: Leading the development of a fintech application in the brokerage domain. Design, architecture, and implementation of main backend systems.

work.name: Cliqz GmbH
work.summary: Member of the core browser team. Focused mainly on low level client-side developments. Implemented solutions to various problems using advanced modern standards.

work.name: Mapegy GmbH
work.summary: Divided equally between full stack front end development and hardcore data engineering. Integrating data sources and improving quality of data.

work.name: HALO Analytics
work.summary: Defined the product and executed its implementation. Planned and defined processes for the product wide scale phase. Successfully delivered multiple product's iterations in pressing time tables.

work.name: Ayyeka Technologies Ltd.
work.summary: Managed the company DevOps section. Developed essential monitoring systems for the company products. Served as the 'quick & dirty development guy' for high demand quick solutions.

work.name: Quickest Owl Ltd.
work.summary: Developed frontend and backend for a massive active protection system.

education.area: Electric Engineering, Major in Computer Engineering

volunteer.summary: Took part in the biggest (to date) non partisan related political campaign.
In a free-of-charge dance club / organization.

references.name: Ariel Stern
references.quote: Mr. Katznelson proved to be a valuable team member, handling numerous tasks that require both a high level of creativity and a ‘getting things done’ attitude.

references.name: Dr. Peter Walde
references.quote: Yotam Katznelson showed an excellent experience and knowledge in many fields, both technical and intellectual.

references.name: Amnon Demri
references.quote: In his work, Yotam Katznelson presented outstanding capabilities. He presented outstanding degree of commitment for the project.
